algorithm_technique: Recursive Depth First Search (DFS) passing parent and grandparent values.
problem_summary_simple: Sum values of nodes whose grandparent has an even value.
problem_summary_technical: Perform a DFS traversal, passing parent and grandparent node values to check the grandparent's parity and sum accordingly.
key_insights: A recursive DFS approach is natural for tree problems.
Passing parent and grandparent information down the recursion is key to checking the condition.
Base case for recursion is when a node is None.
